scripts.dev: shx cp src/manifest.firefox.json src/manifest.json && parcel watch src/manifest.json --host localhost --dist-dir dist-firefox --no-hmr --no-content-hash
scripts.dev:chrome: shx cp src/manifest.chrome.json src/manifest.json && parcel watch src/manifest.json --host localhost --dist-dir dist-chrome --no-hmr --no-content-hash
scripts.build:firefox: shx cp src/manifest.firefox.json src/manifest.json && parcel build src/manifest.json --dist-dir dist-firefox --no-content-hash --no-source-maps
scripts.build:chrome: shx cp src/manifest.chrome.json src/manifest.json && parcel build src/manifest.json --dist-dir dist-chrome --no-content-hash --no-source-maps
